Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Trains bypassing 47th/Dan Ryan Station
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 47th/Dan Ryan due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at 47th/Dan Ryan due to police activity.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include #6 Jackson Park Express

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
